alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 12:26PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clackamas and southeastern Multnomah Counties through 100 PM PST... At 1226 PM PST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Estacada, or 9 miles south of Sandy, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sandy, Mount Hood Village, Estacada, Zigzag, Welches, Shortys Corner, Bull Run and Brightwood. In Oregon this includes U.S. Highway 26 east of Portland between mile markers 23 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades; Western Columbia River Gorge
